If you love to funfailus channel make  pure entertainment/educational videos, then you came to the right place! 

We react and provide transformative commentary over all of the clips used. Clips are carefully collected and reacted to in an effort to maximize viewer satisfaction. We absolutely DO NOT re-upload or reuse content without any sort of transformative nature. See a clip that you'd want us to react to and feature?

Every clip featured in our videos abides by the Fair Use doctrine. We strictly adhere to copyright laws and are guided by a reputable law firm with a specialization in copyright matters
